+@name: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions

info.+content: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions
Yu-Gi-Oh!: O Lado Negro das Dimensões
遊☆戯☆王 THE DARK SIDE OF DIMENSIONS

Six months after the end of the original manga, Yūgi Mutō and his friends are preparing to graduate from high school. Even though he's moving forward, Yūgi still struggles to come to terms that the Pharaoh is no longer with him at times. However, other people may not be so willing to let the past alone. After learning that his long time rival has gone to the afterlife without him claiming victory, Seto Kaiba desperately searches for a way to revive him by digging up the Millennium Puzzle from the Shrine of the Underworld. On the cusp of accomplishing this, his plans are foiled by mysterious stranger, Aigami, who holds power over dimensions.

Six months after the end of the original series, Yugi Muto and his friends are preparing to graduate from high school. While Yugi still feels like he's lost a part of himself, he's come to terms with the Pharaoh's passing, now looking forward to a future alongside his classmates. However, other people may not be so willing to let the past alone. Seto Kaiba still yearns to assert his dueling dominance over the ancient King, desperately searching for a way to revive him. On the cusp of accomplishing this, his plans are foiled by mysterious stranger, Aigami, who holds power over dimensions.
"TO BELIEVE IN SOMETHING" by THE EDEN HOUSE
"Yu-Gi-Oh! Theme: The Dark Side of Dimensions" by Michael Brady, Brendan Brady, Bryan Weber and Kyle Weber
"I'm Back" (instrumental) by John Siegler and Norman J. Grossfeld
"We'll Be There" (instrumental) by John Siegler and Julian Schwartz
Yu-Gi-Oh! – The Dark Side of Dimensions
劇場版『遊☆戯☆王 THE DARK SIDE OF DIMENSIONS』
